document.full_text: australia's qantas airways  plans to scale back some flights and cut management jobs to help offset soaring fuel prices and an estimated a$140 million ($144 million) hit to its earnings from a string of natural disasters in key markets.
document.title: qantas to curb flights, cut jobs to offset fuel
lines_and_colors: australia's qantas airways  plans to scale back some flights and cut management jobs to help offset soaring fuel prices and an estimated a$140 million ($144 million) hit to its earnings from a string of natural disasters in key markets.
